original_text: There are places in your city's walls where people have broken the walls. Your enemies will pull you through those places and they will throw you out. They will take you to that bad place called Harmon. None of you will stay here.’
korean_text: 너희가 성 무너진 데를 통하여 각기 앞으로 바로 나가서 하르몬에 던져지리라 여호와의 말씀이니라

sentences.original_text: There are places in your city's walls
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 도시 성벽에는 어떤 장소들이 있다

sentences.original_text: where people have broken the walls
Your enemies will pull you through those places
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 원수들이 그 장소들을 통해 너희를 끌어낼 것이다

sentences.original_text: and they will throw you out
They will take you to that bad place
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 너희를 그 나쁜 곳으로 데려갈 것이다

sentences.original_text: None of you will stay here
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 중 아무도 여기에 남지 않을 것이다
